name: En Busca de Mortadelo
overview: Mort, while following professor Bacteria’s trace, has been kidnapped by the KGB criminal organization (Killers, Gangsters and Bastards). Before he dissappeared, he used his shoe phone to call to his partner in adventures, our hero Phil Pi. Our mission is to enter the secret den of the enemy organization and once there, set Mort free, give professor Bacteria the antidote and together, get back to the T.I.A. headquarters. Do you dare accept the challenge?
